definition: to be versed in/to know well
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk

sentences.english: I judge him (to be) a skilled worker.
sentences.chinese: 我判定他是一個諳練工人。

sentences.english: Capable of reading English drawing and document, good English spoken skill.
sentences.chinese: 能諳練閱讀英文圖紙和業餘材料，有傑出的白話才能。

sentences.english: My English is far from perfect.
Find ways of using the country's immense skills to provide answers to the rest of the world.
sentences.chinese: 努力用中國的諳練技術爲世界其他國家提供謎底。
